name: Perseverance of Jezero
description:
Perseverance of Jezero is an Educational 3D Adventure-Platformer based on the NASA 2020 mission to send the rover Perseverance to Mars. 

The game focuses on pitting the player's rover against the elements and encourages them to explore across Jezero Crater. Featuring various hazards and mini-games that integrate learning into their challenge.

Developed by:

  • Michael Baker
  • Damon Healy
  • Brittany Richards
  • Dallas Smart

Made in 2021. Developed in Unity, programmed in C#. This game utilizes royalty-free models and textures alongside internally created 3D models and UI elements. Credits found in-game.

Known bugs:

  • Some SFX can fail to play at their triggered events.
  • Switching between Standard and Realistic controls in-game changes the direction of the rover.
